content: these tiny boots and stockings are super quick and easy they are knit entirely in the round on dpns in one piece the stockings consists of only 6 rounds and the boots just 3 my favorite part is their bobble toes which makes shaping a breeze the pattern is also really quick to memorize which makes for excellent tv knitting you can knit a whole rainbow of colors if you want if you like these you may like my mini mittens 2 hope you enjoy this free pattern happy knitting natasha > **praise for mini boots or stockings** > > extremely cute and only took a few > minutes to make bogwoppit 3 > > so easy and so cute the bobble and > the yo cast off make it very quick > with great results on such a tiny > project gigiginny 4 > > this was fast bonewoman 5 > > my goodness these are tiny and quick > lenasmom 6 > > tiny boots that can be knitted in no > time cute mirihi 7 > > these are seriously addicting the > pattern was easy to read and follow > charlenekirkland 8 > > darling little socks fliwatut 9 > > such a sweet wee pattern perfect for > barbie dolls bikerhen 10 1 https //www ravelry com/bundles/winter-1284 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/mini-mittens-18 3 https //www ravelry com/people/bogwoppit 4 https //www ravelry com/projects/gigiginny/tiny-boot 5 https //www ravelry com/people/bonewoman 6 https //www ravelry com/projects/lenasmom/mini-stocking 7 https //www ravelry com/projects/mirihi/mini-boots-or-stockings 8 https //www ravelry com/projects/charlenekirkland/test-mini-stocking 9 https //www ravelry com/projects/fliwatut/mini-stockings-test-knit-for-natasha-hanson 10 https //www ravelry com/projects/bikerhen/mini-boot
